Your family must be very proud of everything you are doing for mankind. What a great citizen you are…have you ever contemplated moving to Somalia? In our hearts, we know you are a pompous clown.

Message.Title: T and certificate of deposits
Message.Msg: I look at T as a safe secure investment that pays a handsome dividend. It is almost like a CD with little to no risk. My dividends are re-invested. Out of my whole portfolio I lose no sleep with T. But it is balanced T is not overweight in my investment strategy.

Message.Title: Lady Claims "Stand Your Ground" - Gets 20 yrs.!!
Message.Msg: Headlines Read .. Lady Claims Stand Your Ground .. Sentenced To 20 Years - (in Fla.) - Well you can't have an 'arguement' with a boyfriend, at his residence, in front of his children , and discharge a firearm with children in the premises. So Jessie Jackson comes to her aid & defense .. trying to stir another "race-baited" attack ?? NOW a few FACTS of ... 'the rest of the story' !! ... This lady, in the course of the arguement, had retreated from the boyfriend's (and children's) premises ... she returns a few minutes later with a "concealed firearm" .. then pursues the previous arguement, exposes and discharges that firearm, endangering everyone in the home .. ... (just thought the 'race-baiters' would want to know this before they started yapping & acting stupid) ... . BTW, per the mapping of Zimm's community (Wikipedia), the rows of residences backed up to each other. The positions of the entry gates of this GATED Community, in relation to the location of the 'incident', shows that T.M's shortest route home was to walk in front of the residences .. NOT BETWEEN the backs of these two rows of this multi-ethnic Community !!
The more shorts the higher it will go eventually. Pray for more shorts.

I'm a little heavy on T and several other comm. shares. I have three mutual funds. One that has lagged for some time has suddenly taken off by about 13% this first half. I'll not sell any T and continue to DRIP all my accounts.

Topic.Title: No blood, no hair, no DNA on the sidewalk

Message.Msg: Trayvon had bruised knuckles. Zim wasn't on the sidewalk but on the grass. Guess that's why nothing was found on the sidewalk, huh?
I'd like to know the details. I very much doubt it was deliberate. No company would do such a thing deliberately.

Yes, I doubt it's deliberate either. This would be complete suicide for AT&T. This may be a result of their overseas call centers, and their mis-intrepretation, by having a robotic script they have to follow, and further overseas mishandling ??
